What's MEXC.com?

MEXC.com is a global cryptocurrency exchange offering a wide range of digital assets and advanced trading capabilities with a secure and intuitive user experience.

  • Spot trading and other advanced tools
  • Competitive trading fees
  • Secure and fast platform
  • Easy to use interface

API Key Setup Process

Follow the steps below to configure your API keys for MEXC.com.

{% include 'include/warnings.html' with warning='Never share your API keys with anyone. We use industry-standard encryption to secure your credentials.' %}

1 Create a MEXC Account

If you donâ€™t already have a MEXC account, please sign up here.

2 Navigate to API Management

  1. Log in to your MEXC account.
  2. Click on your profile icon in the top-right corner.
  3. Select Manage Account from the dropdown menu.

3 Create an API Key

  1. Give the API key a name in the note input.
  2. Turn on the necessary functions required for our system (Spot, view account data, trade permissions, etc.).
  3. Paste our server's IP address in the IP whitelist field: {{ server_ip }}
  4. Click Create.
  5. Make sure to save your API and Secret key securely; you will need them later.

Complete Integration

Once you have your MEXC API keys, return to our platform's Automate section and use them to link your MEXC account with our automation system. This enables automated trading based on your TradingView alerts.
